title: Strategies for Promoting Adult Learner Development Through Enhanced Class Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: An online course analyzing engagement enhancement and developmental linkage mechanisms via structural equation modeling for job seekers and adult learners targeting social sector job competency

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causal relationships between class participation and development using Structural Equation Modeling (SEM).
Learners can design ≥3 metrics to measure engagement levels of large-scale learners in online environments.
Learners can propose engagement enhancement strategies and job development linkage plans through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
